277db9c3-b733-4503-9ce9-b95bfb06e40b.name: Easy to hit
277db9c3-b733-4503-9ce9-b95bfb06e40b.notes: Others can target your eyes at -6

4b5ca617-7fbb-4106-8b0b-5273554fe16a.name: Dependency (Sunlight)
4b5ca617-7fbb-4106-8b0b-5273554fe16a.notes:
Sunlight: need at least 4 hours.per day of bright light or -I HTlhour; fatigue can only be
recovered when resting in the light

c48cc819-53f6-40a4-8a97-de96ca6d5927.name: 频率：不断地
c48cc819-53f6-40a4-8a97-de96ca6d5927.notes: 在没有这种物质的每一分钟里失去 1 点 HP

f0021097-b383-4159-bb10-3135ad912b10.name: 频率：每小时
f0021097-b383-4159-bb10-3135ad912b10.notes: 在没有保证每小时剂量的每 10 分钟里失去 1 点 HP

a482e534-36bb-4ea8-b00e-4084e306caad.name: 频率：每日
a482e534-36bb-4ea8-b00e-4084e306caad.notes: 在没有保证每日剂量的每小时里失去 1 点 HP

6f9153aa-28a1-4f43-ae76-a935076681f0.name: 频率：每周
6f9153aa-28a1-4f43-ae76-a935076681f0.notes: 在没有保证每周剂量的每六小时里失去 1 点 HP

f3a55337-6096-4b47-9ad5-dbefbf69e947.name: 频率：每月
f3a55337-6096-4b47-9ad5-dbefbf69e947.notes: 在没有保证每月剂量的每天里失去 1 点 HP

0f773340-ce33-42e2-965c-e40ac5cd4ddc.name: 频率：每季度
0f773340-ce33-42e2-965c-e40ac5cd4ddc.notes: 在没有保证每季剂量的每三天里失去 1 点 HP

bd8b1247-2caf-4bd2-af77-eaa1e7593d63.name: 频率：每年
bd8b1247-2caf-4bd2-af77-eaa1e7593d63.notes: 在没有保证每年剂量的每两周里失去 1 点 HP

2bad9137-7732-4e3d-afb9-c7a9813bba37.name: 衰老
2bad9137-7732-4e3d-afb9-c7a9813bba37.notes: 每因为此依赖损失 1 HP，你老化两岁

4e2d0f4c-6edb-4200-8df9-838cff09125b.name: Diffuse
4e2d0f4c-6edb-4200-8df9-838cff09125b.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

3e629f5e-44de-4394-8db7-47761c237324.name: Homogenous
3e629f5e-44de-4394-8db7-47761c237324.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

73cddc51-740c-4cfd-8f38-27213c11e31e.name: No Blood
73cddc51-740c-4cfd-8f38-27213c11e31e.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

476036e6-640a-4c25-af55-27b8ff5deb52.name: No Brain
476036e6-640a-4c25-af55-27b8ff5deb52.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

eca42797-990a-4c92-aeaf-99da50e2478f.name: No Eyes
eca42797-990a-4c92-aeaf-99da50e2478f.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

3fde14ce-227a-4453-90a9-64f7e406eff4.name: No Head
3fde14ce-227a-4453-90a9-64f7e406eff4.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

aefea581-017b-4525-98c4-ffd3eac2fc8b.name: No Neck
aefea581-017b-4525-98c4-ffd3eac2fc8b.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

356a3126-f4dd-485a-a6f7-c731d0f97abe.name: No Vitals
356a3126-f4dd-485a-a6f7-c731d0f97abe.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

3f93bc65-57f1-4ca8-9f65-6f1d597f38f2.name: Unliving
3f93bc65-57f1-4ca8-9f65-6f1d597f38f2.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

3cbfada6-ae03-4522-8837-41d3d82057cb.name: 自我传送
3cbfada6-ae03-4522-8837-41d3d82057cb.notes: Teleportation ability. Instantly travel over great distances.

a26e0575-4531-4158-aecb-1d2bafecbd14.name: Mind Shield
a26e0575-4531-4158-aecb-1d2bafecbd14.notes: Sense and defense ability.You have a mental shield protecting you.

18bd43b8-f0b3-4a94-b598-180840595fdf.name: Pyrokinesis
18bd43b8-f0b3-4a94-b598-180840595fdf.notes: Telekinesis ability. You can increase temperatures.

48a9b37f-6f35-4395-a8d0-fcf314372caa.name: Telereceive
48a9b37f-6f35-4395-a8d0-fcf314372caa.notes: Communication ability. You can read another person's thoughts.

9b0148ef-6115-4b54-8b2b-3f0661003742.name: Telesend
9b0148ef-6115-4b54-8b2b-3f0661003742.notes: Communication ability. You can read project your thoughts into another's mind.
